sections.content:
Question:
What types of SOM and SBC are available at RZ/G?
Answer:
Explanations oof SOM and SBC types as well as definitions are available on this blog: Giving Customers the Options to Make or Buy SOM and/or SBC to Accelerate Design Cycle. Please refer to it for information.
Partner boards available at RZ/G include various types including not only SMARC but also OSM and DIMM. Please take a look at the partner page and view the available products.
Suitable Products
RZ/G2L, RZ/G2LC, RZ/G2UL, RZ/Five
